alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 11:39PM CDT until May 31 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR BEAVER...NORTHWESTERN LIPSCOMB AND CENTRAL OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1138 PM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mocane to 7 miles west of Bryans Corner, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Lipscomb, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Follett, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Mocane, Slapout and Balko. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
